sentences.sContent: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.sCn: 新纳粹主义正在德国的一些地方复活。

sentences.sContent: After the disaster caused by Nazism, one of the priorities was to delegitimize the ideology of the inequality of races.
sentences.sContent_eng: After the disaster caused by Nazism, one of the priorities was to delegitimize the ideology of the inequality of races.
sentences.sCn: 在纳粹主义造成的灾难之后，一个首要的问题就是使种族不平等的意识形态去合法化。

sentences.sContent: Interned in a German camp during World War II, she escaped to America and went on to make sense of the horrors of Nazism and Stalinism in her writing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Interned in a German camp during World War II, she escaped to America and went on to make sense of the horrors of Nazism and Stalinism in her writing.
sentences.sCn: 二战期间，阿伦特从一间德国拘役所逃往美国。 而在其著作中，她对纳粹主义和集权主义的恐怖之处做出了深度思考。

trans.tranOther: Nazism was the political ideas and activities of the German Nazi Party
